cards.name: Septa Mordane
cards.text:
While you control:
- Sansa Stark, she gets +2 STR and gains renown.
- Arya Stark, she gains an [intrigue] icon and "immune to opponents' plot effects."

cards.name: Ward
cards.text:
Character with printed cost 4 or lower only. Terminal.
Take control of attached character.
Attached character gains the [stark] affiliation.

cards.name: Butterbumps
cards.text: Insight. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge in which Butterbumps is participating, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

cards.name: A Gift of Arbor Red
cards.text: Action: Kneel your faction card to have each player reveal the top 4 cards of his or her deck. Choose 1 card revealed by each player, and add it to that player's hand. Shuffle the other cards back into their owners' decks.

cards.name: Sworn Brother
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reduce the cost of the first location you marshal each round by 1.

cards.name: Old Bear's Raven
cards.text:
Attached character gains stealth.
If attached character is Old Bear Mormont, he gains an [intrigue] icon.

cards.name: Ser Barristan Selmy
cards.text: Renown. Interrupt: When a Lord or Lady character you control would be killed, stand Ser Barristan Selmy to save that character.

cards.name: City Watch
cards.text: Ambush (6). No attachments except Weapon. While you have more power on your faction card than an opponent, reduce the cost to ambush City Watch by 2.

cards.name: Ser Ilyn Payne
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a character with printed cost 3 or lower.

cards.name: Small Council Chamber
cards.text: Immune to events. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, Small Council Chamber gains 1 power.

cards.name: Dagmer Cleftjaw
cards.text: Renown. Interrupt: When claim is applied for a challenge in which Dagmer Cleftjaw is attacking alone, choose a non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower controlled by the losing opponent. Instead of the normal claim effects, take control of that location.

cards.name: Drowned God's Blessing
cards.text: [greyjoy] character only. Attached character gains the Drowned God trait and cannot be chosen as the only target of opponents' events. +1 Initiative.

cards.name: Jhogo
cards.text: While you control another Bloodrider character, Jhogo gains stealth. While Jhogo is attacking, he gets +X STR, where X is the number of characters in the defending player's dead pile.

cards.name: Funeral Pyre
cards.text: Reaction: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, kneel your faction card to draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Tyene Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge in which Tyene Sand is participating as an attacker, place a poison token on a character without an [intrigue] icon. At the end of the phase, if that character still has the poison token, remove it and kill that character.

cards.name: Imprisoned
cards.text:
Opponent's character only.
Attached character loses a [military] icon.

cards.name: Maester's Chain
cards.text: Maester character only. Dominance Action: Kneel Maester's Chain to choose a Condition attachment, and discard it from play.

cards.name: Street of Silk
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which you control a participating Lord or Lady character, kneel your faction card to search the top 5 cards of your deck for an Ally or Companion card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Forgotten Plans
cards.text: While it is not the plot phase, treat the text box of each revealed non-Scheme plot card as if it were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Close Call
cards.text: When Revealed: Move a character from your dead pile to your discard pile. Then, if there are no Winter plot cards in play, draw 1 card.
